\resumeSubheading
    {<<entry.title>>}{<<entry.date_string>>}
    {
((*- if entry.doi != "" -*))
\href{<<entry.doi_url>>}{<<entry.doi>>}
((*- endif -*))
((*- if entry.doi != "" and entry.journal != "" *)) (((* endif -*))
((*- if entry.journal != "" -*))
<<entry.journal>>
((*- endif -*))
((*- if entry.doi != "" and entry.journal != "" *)))((* endif -*))
}{}
    \resumeItemListStart
        \resumeItem{}{\raggedright <<entry.authors|map("make_it_nolinebreak")|join(", ")>> \par}
    \resumeItemListEnd
